text: Mar Jose Porunnedom (born 13 March 1956) is a Syro-Malabar Catholic Bishop who is currently serving as the Bishop of Manathavady Diocese. He is the third bishop of Manathavady Diocese. == Early life & Episcopal career == Jose Porunnedom was born at Vettimattom of Idukki district on 13 March 1956. After completing his studies at St. Joseph's Minor Seminary, Tellicherry, St. Joseph's Pontifical Seminary, Aluva and at the Pontifical Urban University, Rome he was ordained a priest on 22 December 1982. In 1986, he went to Rome and obtained a Doctorate in Canon Law from Pontifical Oriental Institute. On 18 March 2004, Pope John Paul II named him as the Bishop of Mananthavady as a successor of Bishop Emmanuel Giles Pothanamuzhi. He was consecrated on 15 May 2004, and took charge of the diocese. == References == == External links == *Official Website of Mananthavady Diocese * Category:1956 births Category:Syro-Malabar bishops Category:Pontifical Urban University alumni Category:Christian clergy from Kerala Category:Pontifical Oriental Institute alumni Category:Living people Category:People from Idukki district
title: Jose Porunnedom
